ValidationRule.description: If the Complexity Level if 5, Complexity Level field is READ-ONLY to the end user. Once the Complexity Level goes to 5, it will remain to 5.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Complexity_Level__c) , '5-IPDS Phase 6 Issues - CSB') && ischanged(Complexity_Level__c), true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Complexity Level Cannot be Changed from Level 5
